name: Spotlight Maze Demo
description:
A simple demo project. Navigate the procedurally generated dark maze.

The goal is to make it to the end of the maze, a floating indicator arrow points to the exit which appears as a floating green orb.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys move and rotate

Spacebar toggles your flashlight on/off

Hazards:

Red Cubes - will chase you from far away if your flashlight is on. If they catch you you start anew. Can be killed by being lured into traps. Turning your flashlight off makes it so that they will only follow if right next to you.

Traps - Will only kill you if your flashlight is off.
